byline.original: By BILL VLASIC and NICK BUNKLEY

snippet: Union workers at Ford will vote over the next two weeks on the agreement, which calls for the company to create 5,750 entry-level jobs.
lead_paragraph: Union workers at Ford will vote over the next two weeks on the agreement, which calls for the company to create 5,750 entry-level jobs.

headline.main: In Deal With Ford, Union Wins Wage Increases and Additional Jobs
headline.print_headline: In Deal With Ford, Union Wins Wage Increases and Additional Jobs
headline.seo: Auto Workers Strike Deal With Ford to Raise Wages and Add New Jobs
